title: Cristiano Ronaldo enjoys a romantic lunch date with girlfriend Georgina Rodríguez
text:
He recently revealed his plans to marry his girlfriend of three years.

And following the candid admission, Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodríguez were seen enjoying a romantic lunch date in Turin, Italy, on Wednesday afternoon.

The football ace, 34, and the former shop assistant, 25, have been dating since 2016 and Cristiano confessed that marrying Georgina would be his mother Maria Dolores dos Santos Aveiro's dream.

Sweet: Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodríguez were seen enjoying a romantic lunch date in Turin, Italy, on Wednesday afternoon

Georgina looked chic as she enjoyed a child-free lunch with her beau, wearing an elegant white blouse and a pair of blue denim jeans and dark boots.

Meanwhile, Cristano looked casual in a baseball cap and a cream long-sleeved top as he sat on the cloth-covered table next to his stunning girlfriend.

The couple may have been celebrating after Cristiano smashed Champions League records after scoring in Juventus' win over Bayer Leverkusen on Tuesday night.

The player extended his lead over Lionel Messi at the top of the all-time European goalscorers chart to 16 goals by netting his 128th goal in Turin.

Chic: Georgina looked chic as she enjoyed a child-free lunch with her beau, wearing an elegant white blouse and a pair of blue denim jeans and dark boots

Recently revealing his plans to marry George during an interview with Piers Morgan, he said: 'She helped me so much. Of course I’m in love with her. We’ll be (married) one day, for sure. It’s my mum’s dream as well.'

'So, one day. Why not? It’s great. She’s my friend. We have conversations. I open the heart for her and she opens the heart for me.’

Despite his exciting profession, Georgina recently admitted that it's 'not easy' being in a relationship with someone as famous as him - but she wouldn't change a thing.

Record breaker: The couple may have been celebrating after Cristiano smashed Champions League records after scoring in Juventus' win over Bayer Leverkusen on Tuesday night

The former shop assistant confessed that it was 'love at first sight' when they first met and also revealed how she seduces her footballer beau.

Speaking to The Sun on Sunday, Georgina opened up on her relationship and confessed that although at times it can be tough dating someone in the public eye, she couldn't be happier.

The brunette beauty then went on to say that as well as the emotional connection between them, its important to keep the romantic spark and insists that she always sleeps in lingerie.

Family fun: The football ace, 34, and the former shop assistant, 25, have been dating since 2016 and it seems he is very confident in their union as he made the gushing vow

Georgina, who recently stripped off for a sizzling new campaign with lingerie brand Yamamay, explained: 'What I feel for him is stronger than anything, any kind of pressure.

'Together we are stronger and there is a mutual admiration. But to seduce and to dream is so ­important. I always sleep in lingerie and I prefer sexy lingerie.'

She added that sleeping in her sexy underwear is 'comfortable ' and 'romantic', and it will make your man 'happy'.

The couple first locked eyes on each other when she was working as a sales assistant at a Gucci store in Spain, before meeting again days later at a brand event.

Opening up about that meeting, she explained: 'It was then that we could talk in a relaxed atmosphere, outside of my work environment. It was love at first sight for both.'
